channel.title: 20SOS
channel.description: Connect with like-minded people on the trials and tribulations of being 20-something. Welcome to the home of all things Quarter Life Crisis.

item.title: Your Next Career Could Be In The Arts. (You Just Don't Know It Yet)
Signs You Have Outgrown A Romantic Partner
item.description: Here are a few red flags that you and your partner have outgrown each-other, and that the relationship might no longer be viable.

item.title: 9 Signs You Should Change Your Role
item.description: Ignore them at your own peril

item.title: Unpaid Internships; Unethical, Exploitative And Far Too Common
item.description: And yet I'm currently doing one...

item.title: Beating the Snooze Button: My Plan to Make the Most of the Mornings
item.description: The mornings are a precious commodity - one that is wasted all to easily at the hands of the snooze button.

item.title: Films To Get You Through Your QLC
I'm Successful, So Why Am I Feeling Unfulfilled?
item.description: Why "Success" is not a bulwark against the QLC

item.title: The Quarter Life Crisis: An Opportunity For Growth
item.description: Whilst uncomfortable, a QLC could be an important turning point

item.title: Book Review: Anxious Man by Josh Roberts
item.description: A book on living with mental health that powerfully articulates the quarter life.

item.title: A Portfolio Career: What is It And Is It Right For You?
item.description: Feel boxed in by your 9-5? The Portfolio Career could be for you
